2023450.name: Grindstone Soundtrack Volume 1
2023450.description:
The lush, neck-snapping and funky-as-all-heck GRINDSTONE soundtrack by dynamic composer Sam Webster takes the listener on an odyssey of fantasy-fueled chorals over face-screwing hip hop beats and lo-fi synth sorcery.

Grindstone's OST is surely the gnarliest collection of party-starters to ever appear in a (checks notes) color-matching puzzle game?!

Vol 1: 17 tracks, 43min
